Subject: Block and Remediate mode is not working
Description: I have a policy for blocking MIP labels and the policy mode is set to Block and Remediate. However, the content is blocked but there is no pop-up and there is no remediation in the client. reference : Page 96 of 5.9.3.0 manual (https://www.endpointprotector.com/support/pdf/manual/Endpoint_Protector_5_User_Manual_EN.pdf)
Solution_Comment__c: Customer confirmed that we can close this ticket after sharing the test build with a fix + upgrading their appliance to latest version.
